Edit Delete

{{ "Email: " + contact.email }}

{{ "Phone: " + contact.phone }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Params, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; import { ContactService } from '../contact.service'; import { WindRefService } from '../../wind-ref.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-detail', templateUrl: './contact-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-detail.component.css'] }) export class ContactDetailComponent implements OnInit{ id: string; strid: string; contact: Contact; groupContacts: Contact[] = []; nativeWindow: any; constructor(private windrefservice: WindRefService, private contactService: ContactService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router) { this.nativeWindow = this.windrefservice.getNativeWindow(); } ngOnInit() { this.route.params .subscribe( (params: Params) => { this.id = params['id']; // this.id = "48"; // console.log(this.id); this.contact = this.contactService.getContact(this.id); } ); if (this.contact.group){ this.groupContacts = this.contact.group } } onDelete() { this.contactService.deleteContact(this.contact); this.contactService.getMaxContactId() } onView() { // if (this.contact.url){ // this.nativeWindow.open(this.contact.url); } }
